Name: Baa Baa Crisp
Desc: Increases all teammates' DEF by 40%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
Bg: After multiple attempts, Encore triumphantly created a dish she was pleased with. Golden and crunchy, each bite resembled a miniature lamb. And after indulging, one would surely dream of frolicking among sheep. With this culinary masterpiece, there's no need to fret â€” it can be savored without hesitation.
